title: Design for irrigation: reconstructure of the home farm. Pt 1
brief_description: Shows that a proper plan of irrigation is essential when planting new orchards. The example in the film is a new block of slightly sloping land which is to be planted with fruit trees. A model of the block shows the contours, and the method of ploughing, irrigating and planting which should be carried out in relation to the contour lines.
